metadata.title: CVE-2017-2591 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: 389-ds-base before version 1.3.6 is vulnerable to an improperly NULLterminated array in the uniqueness_entry_to_config() function in the"attribute uniqueness" plugin of 389 Directory Server. An authenticated, orpossibly unauthenticated, attacker could use this flaw to force anout-of-bound heap memory read, possibly triggering a crash of the LDAPservice.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
